rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭露人工智能图像生成器在描绘外科医生方面存在偏见，凸显性别和种族差异该研究分析了人工智能生成的外科医生图像中性别和种族多样性的表现，发现三分之二的流行人工智能文本到图像生成器主要将外科医生描绘为白人和男性，这与该领域的实际多样性形成鲜明对比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-exposes-AI-image-generators-bias-in-depicting-surgeons-highlighting-gender-and-racial-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-exposes-AI-image-generators-bias-in-depicting-surgeons-highlighting-gender-and-racial-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b4c3d4d-87fa-4daf-864e-6719d4c2f7fb Mon, 20 Nov 2023 21:19:00 -0500 Study exposes AI image generators' bias in depicting surgeons, highlighting gender and racial disparities
城市环境质量与乳腺癌发病率相关杜克健康中心对北卡罗来纳州乳腺癌的分析显示，该州城市县的总体发病率高于农村县，尤其是在诊断的早期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Urban-environmental-quality-linked-to-breast-cancer-incidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Urban-environmental-quality-linked-to-breast-cancer-incidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67633c95-c607-4a2c-a9dd-feb4b345595e Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:58:46 -0500 Urban environmental quality linked to breast cancer incidence
德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校的研究人员开发了预测癌症治愈率的改进模型随着过去几十年计算能力的快速发展，机器学习（ML）技术在医疗环境中变得流行，作为预测癌症、心脏病、中风等疾病患者的生存率和预期寿命的一种方法。以及最近的新冠肺炎 (COVID-19)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/UT-Arlington-researchers-develop-improved-model-for-predicting-cancer-cure-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/UT-Arlington-researchers-develop-improved-model-for-predicting-cancer-cure-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e15f38b5-781f-46b5-8208-a45fd128dac0 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:53:48 -0500 UT Arlington researchers develop improved model for predicting cancer cure rates
研究强调糖酵解是对抗结核分枝杆菌的潜在治疗靶点尽管有证据表明与宿主免疫代谢有关，但尚不清楚结核分枝杆菌如何改变人类的免疫反应；免疫细胞的代谢与其免疫功能之间的内在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-highlights-grinding-as-a-potial-therapeutic-target-to-combat-Mycobacter-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-highlights-grinding-as-a-potial-therapeutic-target-to-combat-Mycobacter-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06897112-81cd-4723-8354-35f483bb3935 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:42:09 -0500 Study highlights glycolysis as a potential therapeutic target to combat Mycobacterium tuberculosis
精准 TMS 方法可改善重度抑郁症状患者的治疗结果加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心研究人员的一项新研究表明，即使在多次抗抑郁药物疗程失败后，一种新的治疗方法对大多数患有严重抑郁症状的患者仍然有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Precision-TMS-approach-yields-improved-outcomes-for-病人-with-major-depressive-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Precision-TMS-approach-yields-improved-outcomes-for-病人-with-major-depressive-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71b644d4-4809-4cdf-a8cc-e2658a872b0a Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:40:45 -0500 Precision TMS approach yields improved outcomes for patients with major depressive symptoms
研究揭示小脑核在联想学习中的惊人作用联想学习一直被认为是由小脑皮层（通常被称为“小大脑”）调节的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-reveals-surprising-role-of-cerebellar-nuclei-in-associative-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-reveals-surprising-role-of-cerebellar-nuclei-in-associative-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38df906d-2e35-4fb1-aa82-87252bdeeec9 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:18:54 -0500 Study reveals surprising role of cerebellar nuclei in associative learning
医院专业化和肥胖导致墨西哥剖腹产过度使用近几十年来，剖腹产手术在世界各地急剧增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/C-section-overuse-in-Mexico-driven-by-hospital-specializations-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/C-section-overuse-in-Mexico-driven-by-hospital-specializations-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc629453-ce86-4f3d-9f4b-fe1e027b54eb Mon, 20 Nov 2023 20:06:40 -0500 C-section overuse in Mexico driven by hospital specializations and obesity
人工智能工具在个性化癌症治疗方面显示出前景，但落后于人类专家癌症治疗变得越来越复杂，但也提供了越来越多的可能性。毕竟，对肿瘤的生物学和遗传特征了解得越透彻，治疗方法就越多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-tools-show-promise-in-personalized-cancer-treatment-but-lag-behind- human-experts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-tools-show-promise-in-personalized-cancer-treatment-but-lag-behind- human-experts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=708fe83a-eea0-4afb-a628-a0dd0085d6ae Mon, 20 Nov 2023 19:33:07 -0500 AI tools show promise in personalized cancer treatment, but lag behind human experts
人工智能驱动的诊断工具显示出对少数民族女性的偏见佛罗里达大学的研究人员发现，旨在诊断影响女性的常见感染的机器学习算法在种族群体中表现出诊断偏差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-powered-diagnostic-tools-show-bias-against-women-from-ethnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-powered-diagnostic-tools-show-bias-against-women-from-ethnic-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd17706a-1a36-4e9e-8de4-88c2bd6029da Mon, 20 Nov 2023 19:29:18 -0500 AI-powered diagnostic tools show bias against women from ethnic groups
研究发现老年人跌倒相关头部受伤后的随访和跌倒预防效果不佳在美国，跌倒是造成 65 岁及以上成年人致命和非致命伤害的主要原因。每年有四分之一的老年人跌倒，导致 27,000 人死亡、800 万人次急诊 (ED) 就诊和 80 万人次住院治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-finds-suboptimal-follow-up-and-fall-prevention-for-older-adults-after-fall-lated-head-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-finds-suboptimal-follow-up-and-fall-prevention-for-older-adults-after-fall-lated-head-injury.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04e15684-e8b1-43d5-9371-6de2248011a7 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 19:19:35 -0500 Study finds suboptimal follow-up and fall prevention for older adults after fall-related head injury
